job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Back End Developer

As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining systems around LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models, focusing on user-facing functionalities like data source management and quality assurance for generative AI models. It also mentions integrating a centralized AI platform, aligning with the GenAI Engineer's core responsibilities of developing and deploying applications built on generative models and production-grade user-facing software systems.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on building and ensuring the scalability and reliability of systems integrated with AI models, which includes developing backend services and APIs.
The description mentions building multiple separate services and databases to manage data sources and provide quality assurance functionality.
The role involves integrating a centralized AI platform into a product portfolio, which is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio

job_tasks.justification: The role directly involves working with LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models, including providing fine-grained control over generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models

job_tasks.justification: The job involves providing quality assurance functionality that offers fine-grained control over generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models

job_tasks.justification: The focus on scalability and reliability of systems built around AI infrastructure, and the mention of managing services and databases, implies operational concerns for production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models

soft_skills.phrase: ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems
